system.prerequisites:
Psy Rating 5,
Cleansing Flame
or Sanctuary
system.sustained: Character emits a Psychic Blast of Psy Rating Metre Radius each turn this power is sustained centred on themselves, this blast can be avoided in the same way as a Blast Weapon. Those who do not avoid the blast suffer 1d10 x Psy Rating damage with PEN 0, Flame and Warp Weapon qualities. However, each turn the power is sustained, the Psyker suffers 1d10 + Psy Rating Energy damage that ignores Armour and Toughness.
